$interpreted: Puggi: Paaang!! Pangy-Pang-Pang!!! We're here for some late-night BBQ! BAR-BE... que?
Hestia: Wow, so many new tigers!
Yan Bo: Their attire... soldiers?
Pang: Correct. Here to apprehend me.
Hestia: A... apprehend!?
Yan Bo: And for what reason?
Pang: General Yu of the Tiger Tribe was assassinated last month, and the tribe's holy talisman has gone missing.
Pang: They suspect me.
Hestia: Last month? But you've been here the whole time!
Puggi: You hear that~!? Pang's been with us the whole time! Quit suspectin' my little bro!
Puggi: You no-named NPCs! You shouldn't be allowed to piss off the main character!
Yan Bo: Been exiled for years, you have. How could you be a suspect?
Pang: When Yao betrayed the tribe, he wounded General Yu on the right side of his chest.
Pang: I've heard that injury had plagued him ever since. Still pained him to the touch.
Yan Bo: Quite the weak point, it would seem.
Pang: They said he kept it a secret—never sought medical care.
Pang: And up until now, only those closest to him knew of the injury...
Yan Bo: And of course, Yao...
Pang: According to the coroner, the wound was exact. Right on target, and immediately fatal. The general had no time to retaliate.
Yan Bo: Yes... the old wound's exact spot, the perpetrator must have known.
Pang: When Yao died, his whole squad was wiped out. Now, the only possible suspect is me... Yao's old friend.
Hestia: Even though I don't know what you guys are talking about... I'm mad! Pang isn't a bad guy! He's innocent!
Hestia: I won't let you meanies bully him!
Yan Bo: Pang, know what you are thinking, I do.
Yan Bo: Exiled, you are. Return home on your own accord, and you won't leave again so easily.
Yan Bo: Severe punishment, you will face.
Pang: But if I don't go back, the tribe will never stop sending soldiers after me.
Yan Bo: Only a few assassins. Handle them, we can. Together.
Yan Bo: Together, we are strong.
Puggi: That's right! Protecting my lil' bro is the hero's responsibility. Assassins smeshmaffins—they're chumps!
Hestia: Yeah Pang, we've got your back!
Pang: ...But, the tribe is my homeland. And if General Yu's death is truly connected to Yao...
Yan Bo: I understand, but worry not. No matter the circumstances, support you, we will.
Pang: ...Thank you.
Pang: (...Please, forgive me for not saying goodbye...)
Hestia: Wait, where did he go...!?
Puggi: Don't you worry! Pang's ditched me tons o' times! I've gotten good at finding him again.
Puggi: He went... that way!
Hestia: Really? Then let's go!
Hestia: Ah—! Don't eat Puggi!
Puggi: Eeeeeeeek!
Hestia: Help!
Pang: ...Guhh...
Hestia: Pang! Puggi's gonna get eaten!
Puggi: Pang~ I knew you couldn't bear to leave me!
Puggi: Hey! Why am I the one that gets hit!? Not fair!
Pang: Why are you following me!? Go back!
Hestia: Because... because we want to go to the East Alliance!
Pang: It's too dangerous! I must hide my identity. If I'm caught, it's over.
Pang: And if you go with me, it'll be over for you, too.
Pang: This isn't a game! It's not like before, where I was always there to protect you.
Puggi: So you mean...
Puggi: If we can take care of ourselves, then we can come along!?
Pang: That's not what I meant.
Puggi: Hestiaaa~
Hestia: I'm ready!
Puggi: It's time for our combo attack! PUGGI POUNCE!!
Pang: Wait... what are you...!?
Puggi: Whew... the student surpasses the master! I'll give you a break this time...
Pang: No, I'll give YOU a break.
Hestia: Pang, please bring us along! I really want to go east... I want to see my hometown!
Pang: ...I remember you saying you have no memory of home.
Hestia: Yeah, but not remembering just makes me way more curious!
Hestia: Plus, I'm tired of not knowing anything about where I'm from. I want to know what my home is really like.
Puggi: Pang~ Look at Hesty, she's begging you! You'd have to be pretty heartless to refuse that face!
Pang: At least she has a good reason. What about you?
Puggi: Well, I obviously have to protect you and Hestia! It's my responsibility as the leading man!
Pang: (Seems like even if I say no, they'll just come anyway... What a pain...)
Pang: ...Fine. Let's go.

Hestia: Really!? Yay~!
Hooomee~ We're coming hooomee agaaain!!
Puggi: Pang~ You finally understand the hero's burden.
Pang: Since this is happening, I guess there's no point traveling in darkness... We leave tomorrow at first light.
Hestia: Yes sir!

Model.Text: Paaang!! Pangy-Pang-Pang!!! We're here for some late-night BBQ! BAR-BE... que?
Wow, so many new tigers!
Their attire... soldiers?
Correct. Here to apprehend me.
A... apprehend!?
And for what reason?
General Yu of the Tiger Tribe was assassinated last month, and the tribe's holy talisman has gone missing.
They suspect me.
Last month? But you've been here the whole time!
You hear that~!? Pang's been with us the whole time! Quit suspectin' my little bro!
You no-named NPCs! You shouldn't be allowed to piss off the main character!
Been exiled for years, you have. How could you be a suspect?
When Yao betrayed the tribe, he wounded General Yu on the right side of his chest.
I've heard that injury had plagued him ever since. Still pained him to the touch.
Quite the weak point, it would seem.
They said he kept it a secret—never sought medical care.
And up until now, only those closest to him knew of the injury...
And of course, Yao...
According to the coroner, the wound was exact. Right on target, and immediately fatal. The general had no time to retaliate.
Yes... the old wound's exact spot, the perpetrator must have known.
When Yao died, his whole squad was wiped out. Now, the only possible suspect is me... Yao's old friend.
Even though I don't know what you guys are talking about... I'm mad! Pang isn't a bad guy! He's innocent!
I won't let you meanies bully him!
Pang, know what you are thinking, I do.
Exiled, you are. Return home on your own accord, and you won't leave again so easily.
Severe punishment, you will face.
But if I don't go back, the tribe will never stop sending soldiers after me.
Only a few assassins. Handle them, we can. Together.
Together, we are strong.
That's right! Protecting my lil' bro is the hero's responsibility. Assassins smeshmaffins—they're chumps!
Yeah Pang, we've got your back!
...But, the tribe is my homeland. And if General Yu's death is truly connected to Yao...
I understand, but worry not. No matter the circumstances, support you, we will.
...Thank you.
(...Please, forgive me for not saying goodbye...)
Wait, where did he go...!?
Don't you worry! Pang's ditched me tons o' times! I've gotten good at finding him again.
He went... that way!
Really? Then let's go!
Ah—! Don't eat Puggi!
Eeeeeeeek!
Help!
...Guhh...
Pang! Puggi's gonna get eaten!
Pang~ I knew you couldn't bear to leave me!
Hey! Why am I the one that gets hit!? Not fair!
Why are you following me!? Go back!
Because... because we want to go to the East Alliance!
It's too dangerous! I must hide my identity. If I'm caught, it's over.
And if you go with me, it'll be over for you, too.
This isn't a game! It's not like before, where I was always there to protect you.
So you mean...
If we can take care of ourselves, then we can come along!?
That's not what I meant.
Hestiaaa~
I'm ready!
It's time for our combo attack! PUGGI POUNCE!!
Wait... what are you...!?
Whew... the student surpasses the master! I'll give you a break this time...
No, I'll give YOU a break.
Pang, please bring us along! I really want to go east... I want to see my hometown!
...I remember you saying you have no memory of home.
Yeah, but not remembering just makes me way more curious!
Plus, I'm tired of not knowing anything about where I'm from. I want to know what my home is really like.
Pang~ Look at Hesty, she's begging you! You'd have to be pretty heartless to refuse that face!
At least she has a good reason. What about you?
Well, I obviously have to protect you and Hestia! It's my responsibility as the leading man!
(Seems like even if I say no, they'll just come anyway... What a pain...)
...Fine. Let's go.

Really!? Yay~!
Hooomee~ We're coming hooomee agaaain!!
Pang~ You finally understand the hero's burden.
Since this is happening, I guess there's no point traveling in darkness... We leave tomorrow at first light.
Yes sir!

","sfxName":"t0017_story_004","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Hestia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/e0002","IconName":"e0002s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Pang, please bring us along! I really want to go east... I want to see my hometown!","sfxName":"e0002_story_014","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I remember you saying you have no memory of home.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Hestia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/e0002","IconName":"e0002s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yeah, but not remembering just makes me way more curious!","sfxName":"e0002_story_011","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Hestia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/e0002","IconName":"e0002s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Plus, I'm tired of not knowing anything about where I'm from. I want to know what my home is really like.","sfxName":"e0002_story_015","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_26_003","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Pang~ Look at Hesty, she's begging you! You'd have to be pretty heartless to refuse that face!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"At least she has a good reason. What about you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, I obviously have to protect you and Hestia! It's my responsibility as the leading man! ","sfxName":"b0037_story_010","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Seems like even if I say no, they'll just come anyway... What a pain...)","sfxName":"t0017_story_021","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Fine. Yay~!\nHooomee~ We're coming hooomee agaaain!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Pang~ You finally understand the hero's burden. ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_304_002_dialog_english##_30_003","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Since this is happening, I guess there's no point traveling in darkness...
